name: Space Attack 3 Beta
description:
Note: This is a Early Access to my game Space Attack 3.The game might contain bugs.

This is a updated version of my unity project Space Attack 2 Released(taken from Unity FPS  Sample).Fight dangerous bots from mars pickup new weapons, jetpacks Please support me by Donating. My projects are free of cost. Also follow me and share my project.

What's New:

Added new Graphics Option(Low,Medium,High)

Added quit button on lose screen

Added new level

Improved texture and Graphics

Added Realtime Shaders

System Requirement Minimum:

OS: 64-bit Windows 7 

Processor: Intel CPU Core i3-3220 / AMD CPU Ryzen 5 2600X  

Memory: 4 GB RAM      

Graphics: NVIDIA GT 710 / AMD HD 4870 / Iris Plus Graphics     

DirectX: Version 11                                                                                        

System Requirement Recommended:                                                                                          

OS: 64-bit Windows 10 / Windows 11                                                                                         

Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K / AMD CPU Ryzen 5 3600.                                                  

Memory: 8 GB RAM.                                                                                                                 

Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX series / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 and above                  

DirectX: Version 11.
